title: Unfinished bowl

properties.name: description
properties.value: An unfinished bowl is an intermediate step in gnomebowl-based gnome cooking for a chocolate bomb, worm hole or veg ball. It is created after baking the half made bowl, which also releases the gnomebowl mould back into your inventory for reuse. Final ingredients then need to be added to create the final dish.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Unfinished bowl

An unfinished bowl is an intermediate step in gnomebowl-based gnome cooking for a chocolate bomb, worm hole or veg ball. It is created after baking the half made bowl, which also releases the gnomebowl mould back into your inventory for reuse. Final ingredients then need to be added to create the final dish.

  • Unfinished bowl (worm hole)
  • Unfinished bowl (veg ball)
  • Unfinished bowl (chocolate bomb)
